scripts.server:integration: cd server && TEST=Integration authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --debug
scripts.client: cd client && npm run-script config:local && npm run-script start
scripts.local: concurrently "npm run nodemon" "cd server && venv/bin/flask  run --debug"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && TEST=Integration authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --debug" "cd client && npm run-script test:integration"
scripts.test:light: concurrently "cd server && TEST=Integration authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --debug" "cd client && npm run-script test:integration_light"
scripts.migrate: cd server && ALEMBIC=migrate authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80
scripts.upgrade: cd server && ALEMBIC=upgrade authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80
scripts.upgrade:integration: cd server && ALEMBIC=upgrade TEST=Integration authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80
scripts.downgrade: cd server && ALEMBIC=downgrade authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80
scripts.downgrade:integration: cd server && ALEMBIC=downgrade TEST=Integration authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80
scripts.synthetic: cd server && SYNTHETIC=1000 authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80
scripts.synthetic:integration: cd server && SYNTHETIC=1000 TEST=Integration authbind --deep  venv/bin/flask  run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=80
